title: Chapter XIV - Office for People With Developmental Disabilities
content:
Chapter XIV - Office for People With Developmental Disabilities

State Regulations

Part 602 - Uniform Hearing Procedures (§ 602.1 to 602.99)

Part 603 - Public Access To Records Pursuant To The Freedom Of Information Law (§ 603.1 to 603.13)

Part 604 - Access to or Correction/Amendment of Records of the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities Subject to the Personal Privacy Protection Law (§ 604.1 to 604.12)

Part 606 - Availability and Access to Incorporated by Reference Materials Contained in 14 NYCRR Parts 600-699 and 14 NYCRR Parts 1-500 Applicable to Services and Programs Certified and/or Operated by the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities (§ 606.1 to 606.5)

Part 619 - Certification of Facilities and Services (§ 619.1 to 619.4)

Part 635 - General Quality Control and Administrative Requirements Applicable to Programs, services or Facilities Funded or Certified by the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities (Subpart 635-1 to 635-99)

Part 636 - Services And Supports For Individuals With Developmental Disabilities (Subpart 636-1 to 636-3)

Part 641 - Rate Setting For Non-state Providers (Subpart 641-1 to 641-3)

Part 643 - Certificate of Relief from Disabilities (Prohibitions) Related to Firearms Possession (§ 643.1 to 643.4)

Part 645 - Limits On Administrative Expenses And Executive Compensation (Repealed) (§ 645.1 to 645.6)

Part 671 - HCBS Waiver Community Residential Habilitation Services for Persons with Developmental Disabilities (§ 671.1 to 671.99)

Part 676 - Diagnostic and Research Clinics (§ 676.1 to 676.12)

Part 679 - Clinic Treatment Facilities (§ 679.1 to 679.99)

Part 680 - Specialty Hospitals (§ 680.1 to 680.14)

Part 681 - Intermediate Care Facilities for Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities (§ 681.1 to 681.99)

Part 686 - Operation of Community Residences (§ 686.1 to 686.99)

Part 687 - Family Care Homes for People With Developmental Disabilities (§ 687.1 to 687.99)

Part 688 - [Repealed]
Part 690 - Day Treatment Services to Persons with Developmental Disabilities (§ 690.1 to 690.99)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 602 - Uniform Hearing Procedures (§ 602.1 to 602.99)
